label: design_construction_and_maintenance_of_the_storage_areas_that_results_in_a_dry_clean_well_ventilated_area_protected_from_dust_condensation_or_other_sources_of_cross_contamination
comment: Design, construction and maintenance of the storage areas that results in a dry, clean, well-ventilated area protected from dust, condensation or other sources of (cross)contamination.
